H0.text: when was the land rover defender first built. 1948

H1.text: when was the land rover defender first built. 1958

H2.text: when was the land rover defender first built. 1967

H3.text: when was the land rover defender first built. 1991

A4.text: The biggest change to the Land Rover Series came in late 1990, when it became the Land Rover Defender.

A5.text: The Land Rover Series was launched at the Amsterdam Motor Show in April 1948.

A6.text: The Land Rover Series became the Land Rover Defender in late 1990.

A7.text: The Land Rover 90 (Ninety) and 110 (One‑Ten) models were introduced in 1983.

A8.text: In 1990, the Ninety and One‑Ten range of models are given the generic name of Defender.
